member.name: T:Arc.CustomApp.Application.Queries.GetStudentByIdQuery
member.summary: Represents a query to retrieve a student by their unique identifier.
member.remarks: This query is used to request information about a specific student based on their ID. It is typically handled by a mediator or query handler that processes the request and returns the corresponding .
member.param: The unique identifier of the student to retrieve. Must be a positive integer.
